summary.span: 方法指示选中值是否通过 。

span.span: method that indicates whether the checked value passed the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的数据绑定模型使你能够将 与 或 对象相关联。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 你可以创建自定义规则，方法是为 类创建子类并实现 方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法返回一个 对象，以报告选中值是否有效。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 有关验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)中的 "数据验证"。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现验证规则，该规则将输入值标记为无效（如果它包含非数字字符或超出下限和上限）。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果该值无效，则返回 的 属性和 属性将分别设置为相应的错误消息和 `false`。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[如何：实现绑定验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-csharp[BindValidation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/AgeRangeRule.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的数据绑定模型使你能够将 与 或 对象相关联。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 你可以创建自定义规则，方法是为 类创建子类并实现 方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法返回一个 对象，以报告选中值是否有效。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 有关验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)中的 "数据验证"。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现验证规则，该规则将输入值标记为无效（如果它包含非数字字符或超出下限和上限）。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果该值无效，则返回 的 属性和 属性将分别设置为相应的错误消息和 `false`。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[如何：实现绑定验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).
